column1: Uchi////Came here for happy hour on a weeknight and I'm going to venture and say this is the best sushi in Houston
column2: hands down.  As far as presentation and creativity
column3: Uchi cannot be beat.  The price is a killer
column4: ended up spending $100 for two people but you get what you pay for.  It's nice to go once for the experience
column6: I'd probably rather go to Kata Robata on a regular rotation.
